tool_description: Analyzes project specifications to determine required tools, optional tools, and suggests alternatives based on available equipment.

joint_types.description: List of joints to be used in the project

lumber_dimensions.description: Dimensions of lumber to be processed

skill_level.description: Woodworker skill level: beginner, intermediate, or advanced

budget_constraint.description: Tool budget level: low, medium, or high

error_messages: Invalid project type: Use recognized woodworking project types
Invalid skill level: Use beginner, intermediate, or advanced
Invalid budget constraint: Use low, medium, or high
Insufficient joint information: Provide at least one joint type
Invalid lumber dimensions: Use proper dimension format

usage: Specify project details, joint types, and lumber dimensions. Optionally list available tools and budget constraints. The tool recommends required and optional tools.

essential_tools.description: Tools absolutely required for the project

recommended_tools.description: Tools that would make the project easier

alternative_methods.description: Alternative approaches if certain tools are unavailable

tool_rental_suggestions.description: Expensive tools that might be better to rent
